trans-unit.source: Identifies a cell in the grid.
trans-unit.target: 모눈의 셀을 식별합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> can be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to get or set the value of any cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 와 함께에서 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> 속성을 가져오거나 셀의 값을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> causes the focus to move to the cell specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> 속성을 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 으로 인해 지정 된 셀으로 이동 하려면 포커스가 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> and returns the column and row number of the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 할당 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 선택된 된 셀의 열 및 행 수를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value stored in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is also printed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 에 저장 된 값의 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> 를 사용 하 여 함께 인쇄는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 개체의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of a row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />의 행 번호입니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of a column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />의 열 번호입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> and sets the new instance to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 새 인스턴스를 설정 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of a column in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 컨트롤의 열 번호를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of the column.
trans-unit.target: 열 번호입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> 지정할 값은 <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> 에 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> 연관는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 할당는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value stored in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is returned by specifying <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> objects through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 에 저장 된 값의 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> 지정 하 여 반환 <xref:System.Data.DataRow> 및 <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> 통해 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: An object you are to comparing.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> is identical to a second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />이 두 번째 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />과 동일한지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the second object is identical to the first; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 둘째 개체가 첫째와 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example compares two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> objects.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 두 개의 비교 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash value that can be added to a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />에 추가할 수 있는 해시 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A number that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> in a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />에서 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />을 고유하게 식별하는 번호입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example adds the hash value of the selected cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control to a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.
trans-unit.target: 선택된 된 셀의 해시 값을 추가 하는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 컨트롤을 한 <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of a row in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 컨트롤의 행 번호를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row.
trans-unit.target: 행 번호입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> value to specify a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> 지정할 값은 <xref:System.Data.DataRow> 에 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> 연관는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> and returns the value stored in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 할당는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 에 저장 된 값을 반환 하 고는 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> 개체의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row number and column number of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 행 번호 및 열 번호를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the row number and column number.
trans-unit.target: 행 번호 및 열 번호를 포함하는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example returns the row number of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 행 번호를 반환 하는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> 를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> 개체의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ToString%2A> 메서드.
